note:
Freelance writer, author of Adventures in Bubbles and Brine, editor of Write magazine. King's MFA. Half Greek, half Jewish. Ex-Montreal. Now Halifax. "Low intelligent, so ignorant, so pathetically socialist."

Profile pic: Man with short beard and glasses wearing a sweater and puffy orange vest. Header: Vintage Atlantis pinball backglass with "Winners don't use drugs" spelled out on the display.
